trans-unit.source: Defines the attribute that indicates whether a control is treated as a visual or non-visual control during design time.
This class cannot be inherited.

The NonVisualControlAttribute attribute is applied to controls that are not rendered to the client, such as data source controls and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
During design time, a page developer might decide to hide all non-visual controls.
The designer would mark as invisible all of the controls with the NonVisualControlAttribute attribute set to `true`.

Examples of controls that employ the NonVisualControlAttribute attribute are <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute"></xref> class.

A default instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute> class is equivalent to the <xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute.NonVisual> field, or passing `true` to the <xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName> constructor.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute"></xref> class, using the specified Boolean value to determine whether the attribute represents a visual or non-visual control.

Passing `true` to this constructor is equivalent to using the <xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute.NonVisual> field, and passing `false` is equivalent to using the <xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute.Visual> field.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to initialize the <xref href="System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute"></xref> to represent a Web control that is not rendered to the client at run time; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a <xref href="System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute"></xref> instance that represents the application-defined default value of the attribute.
This field is read-only.
A default instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute> class is equivalent to the <xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute> field.
To be added.
Returns a value that indicates whether this instance is equal to a specified object.
An <xref:System.Object> to compare with this instance or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
if obj equals the type and value of this instance; otherwise, .
Returns the hash code for this instance.
A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
Returns a value indicating whether the current instance is equivalent to a default instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute"></xref> class.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current instance is equivalent to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute.Default"></xref> instance of the class; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value indicating whether the control is non-visual.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control has been marked as non-visual; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a <xref href="System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute"></xref> instance that is applied to a Web control to be treated as a non-visual control during design time.
This field is read-only.

The NonVisual field is equivalent to creating an instance of the attribute using the <xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName> constructor and passing `true` as the parameter value.
To be added.
Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute"></xref> instance that is applied to a Web control to be treated as a visual control during design time.

The Visual field is equivalent to creating an instance of the attribute using the default <xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute.%23ctor?displayProperty=fullName> constructor, or creating an instance of the attribute using the <xref:System.Web.UI.NonVisualControlAttribute.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName> constructor and passing `false` as the parameter value.
To be added.
